name: yahoo_sales_agent
description: Yahoo Advertising Platform Agent - AdCP v2.3.0 compliant. Provides access to Yahoo's advertising inventory, campaign creation, and performance tracking via Salesforce Data Cloud and Snowflake.

skills.name: Echo
skills.description: Simple echo test skill that returns the input message. Used for testing A2A connectivity.

skills.name: Discover Products
skills.description: Search Yahoo's advertising inventory using natural language brief. Returns products with pricing, reach estimates, targeting capabilities, and creative formats. Data source: Salesforce Data Cloud (virtualizing Snowflake via Zero Copy).

skills.name: Create Campaign
skills.description: Create a new AdCP v2.3.0 compliant advertising campaign (media buy). Writes to Snowflake and reflects instantly in Data Cloud via Zero Copy. Returns campaign ID and confirmation.

skills.name: Get Campaign Status
skills.description: Retrieve real-time campaign delivery metrics including impressions delivered, spend, and pacing status. Data source: Salesforce Data Cloud (virtualizing Snowflake).
